operations.DeleteMicrosoftTeamsConfiguredTeam: Deletes the Microsoft Teams team authorization allowing for channels to be configured in that Microsoft Teams team. Note that the Microsoft Teams team must have no channels configured to remove it.
operations.DeleteSlackWorkspaceAuthorization: Deletes the Slack workspace authorization that allows channels to be configured in that workspace. This requires all configured channels in the workspace to be deleted.
operations.DescribeChimeWebhookConfigurations: Lists Chime Webhook Configurations optionally filtered by ChatConfigurationArn
operations.DescribeSlackChannelConfigurations: Lists Slack Channel Configurations optionally filtered by ChatConfigurationArn
operations.DescribeSlackUserIdentities: Lists all Slack user identities with a mapped role.
operations.DescribeSlackWorkspaces: Lists all authorized Slack Workspaces for AWS Account
operations.GetMicrosoftTeamsChannelConfiguration: Get a single MS Teams Channel Configurations
operations.ListMicrosoftTeamsChannelConfigurations: Lists MS Teams Channel Configurations optionally filtered by TeamId
operations.ListMicrosoftTeamsConfiguredTeams: Lists all authorized MS teams for AWS Account
operations.ListMicrosoftTeamsUserIdentities: Lists all Microsoft Teams user identities with a mapped role.
operations.ListTagsForResource: Retrieves the list of tags applied to a configuration.
operations.TagResource: Applies the supplied tags to a configuration.
operations.UntagResource: Removes the supplied tags from a configuration

AccountPreferences.base: Preferences which apply for AWS Chatbot usage in the calling AWS account.

refs.SlackUserIdentity$AwsUserIdentity: The AWS user identity ARN used to associate a Slack User Identity with an IAM Role.
refs.TeamsUserIdentity$AwsUserIdentity: The AWS user identity ARN used to associate a Microsoft Teams User Identity with an IAM Role.

refs.AccountPreferences$UserAuthorizationRequ: Enables use of a user role requirement in your chat configuration.
refs.AccountPreferences$TrainingDataCollectio: Turns on training data collection. This helps improve the AWS Chatbot experience by allowing AWS Chatbot to store and use your customer information, such as AWS Chatbot configurations, notifications, user inputs, AWS Chatbot generated responses, and interaction data. This data helps us to continuously improve and develop Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies. Your data is not shared with any third parties and is protected using sophisticated controls to prevent unauthorized access and misuse. AWS Chatbot does not store or use interactions in chat channels with Amazon Q for training AWS Chatbot’s AI technologies.
refs.CreateSlackChannelConfigurationRequest$U: Enables use of a user role requirement in your chat configuration.
refs.CreateTeamsChannelConfigurationRequest$U: Enables use of a user role requirement in your chat configuration.
refs.SlackChannelConfiguration$UserAuthorizat: Enables use of a user role requirement in your chat configuration.
refs.TeamsChannelConfiguration$UserAuthorizat: Enables use of a user role requirement in your chat configuration.
refs.UpdateAccountPreferencesRequest$UserAuth: Enables use of a user role requirement in your chat configuration.
refs.UpdateAccountPreferencesRequest$Training: Turns on training data collection. This helps improve the AWS Chatbot experience by allowing AWS Chatbot to store and use your customer information, such as AWS Chatbot configurations, notifications, user inputs, AWS Chatbot generated responses, and interaction data. This data helps us to continuously improve and develop Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies. Your data is not shared with any third parties and is protected using sophisticated controls to prevent unauthorized access and misuse. AWS Chatbot does not store or use interactions in chat channels with Amazon Q for training AWS Chatbot’s AI technologies.
refs.UpdateSlackChannelConfigurationRequest$U: Enables use of a user role requirement in your chat configuration.
refs.UpdateTeamsChannelConfigurationRequest$U: Enables use of a user role requirement in your chat configuration.
